title: The game wont patch
body: When the game starts patching at random times it gives me an error message saying that it does not know why it needs to restart the client and it starts again. and the same thing happens

replies.body: Hey this could be happening for a few reasons, most commonly anti-virus blocks or an unstable connection.  Double check your anti-virus to make sure League is added as an exception, and use our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to autoconfigure firewall settings.  Should the issue persists, try the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide, with emphasis on port forwarded or configuring your DNS.  I hope that helps!
